column4: hi, i need some help.  i installed ubuntu 7.04 in my comp with the alt cd, but when i try to boot, the splash screen freezes at the third bar, around 13%
i heard the alt version was more flexible and so i installed it, but it happens with the regular cd also.
edit the kernel boot options... nosplash quiet  ... this wont fix your problem, but it will let us know where the kernel panics ... and perhaps someone will have an idea then
